title: Define project requirements and goals
description:
Detailed documentation of the specific needs and objectives of the Urban Development Simulator, considering all relevant stakeholders. This document should include functional, non-functional, and performance requirements.

Example: Minimum required resolution for visualizing urban landscapes, real-time data processing capabilities, compatibility with GIS systems, etc.

title: Develop simulation algorithms
description: Create the mathematical models for urban development scenarios and their evolution over time.

title: Design the user interface
description: Create wireframes and interactive prototypes for the Urban Development Simulator's frontend.

title: Implement the simulation backend
description: Develop the underlying systems that handle data processing, simulations, and calculations.

title: Integrate database systems
description: Set up and configure databases to store project data efficiently.

title: Establish DevOps workflows and infrastructure
description: Configure continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines and necessary server infrastructure.

title: Perform unit tests and code reviews
description: Test individual components of the Urban Development Simulator to ensure functionality and adherence to best practices.

title: Create Technical Documentation for Urban Development Simulator
description: Write clear and concise guides for both developers and users on how to utilize the Urban Development Simulator effectively. Guides should include installation, setup, usage instructions, API documentation, and troubleshooting tips.
